segments.text: Is this the right bus for San Francisco ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sure is.Can I see your ticket ? OK , fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About two hours out of Los Angeles . Give me the bags , I'll put'em on the bus . Here's your claim tag . Don't lose it.When you get off the bus , give it to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it all right to smoke on the bus ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , but only in the rear , and only cigarettes . And alcohol is not allowed .
segments.speaker: S1
